snippet.title: Questprobe: Spider-Man walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Adventure International)
snippet.description:
Questprobe: Spider-Man (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/spider-man) was a graphics adventure game published by Adventure International in 1984 for the Apple ][. It was the second game in the Questprobe series.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - mocagh.org
Walkthrough - www.ifarchive.org
